nodes.text: The Experimental Holorecording Macrobinoculars was a specialized Macrobinoculars device developed by Alliance Special Forces technicians. It was capable of recording an image from up to 1000 meters away.

Prior to its development, recording an image required a jury-rigged link between regular macrobinoculars and Holorecorders. After the Battle of Endor, the Neuro-Saav Corporation produced the Model TT4 Holorecording Macrobinoculars.
